channel.title: Meta on Coding in Old Entish
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Coding in Old Entish

item.title: The RSS feed is (hopefully) fixed!
item.description: Earlier this year, while at CppNow, I completely broke the RSS feed for this blog. Really sorry about that, and thanks to Jonathan for pointing it out. However, I have been distracted with work, life, and a bunch of complications over the intervening months and have only now managed to fix it. I hope? Let’s hope. As is all-too-common, the fix was easy once I understood how to fix it and understood the surprising constraints on how to add that fix to the blog infrastructure.
